isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Valve Train: Push Rods, Hydraulic Valve Lifters And Camshaft - Push Rods and Hydraulic Valve Lifters - Leak Down Test

svcproc.title: Leak Down Test
svcproc.para: This test is used to determine whether leakage past the plunger and lifter body is correct and whether the check valve is functioning properly.

note.para: Use a test fluid specified by the tool manufacturer. Make sure that the fluid is at room temperature.

svcproc.para: Use a hydraulic valve lifter tester to check the leak down rate. Follow the instructions that come with the testing unit.
The leak down rate is how many seconds it takes for the plunger to move a specified portion of the distance it will travel while under a 23 kg (50 lb) load. Refer to the specifications.
